description: System-generated unique identifier for the invoice detail record.
Identifier linking this detail line to its parent purchase order invoice.
Identifier of the originating purchase order line item associated with this invoice detail.
Number of units received against this line, measured in the purchase order’s unit of measure.
Quantity not yet fulfilled and placed on backorder for this line, in the purchase order’s unit of measure.
Quantity canceled and no longer expected to be received for this line, in the purchase order’s unit of measure.
Likely references a labor charge record associated with this invoice detail; confirm with SME.
IP address captured for the most recent change to this record, for audit/version control.
Identifier of the user account that last modified this record (row versioning audit).
Initials of the user who performed the most recent update to this record.
Timestamp when this record was last created or updated (row version).
Date the goods or services on this line were received.
Warehouse storage location/bin code where the received items for this line are placed.
